1: Grab B3 and push it into SA1
10: Push B4 into SA1 then move back to almost grasp B4
2: Push B3 to the bottom of the environment, then push B2 into SA1
3: Grab B3 and put it into SA1, while nudging the two purple triangles up and to the left
4: Push B2 into SA1, then go back and grab B1 and spin around to face SA1 again
5: Push B1 a little to the right so that it's in SA1, then move backwards to the left edge of the environment
6: Push B3 into SA1, then move back to the left edge of the arena
7: Push B1 and B4 into SA1
8: Push B4 into SA1, and B2 down and to the right
9: Push B4 into SA1 then move the robot back to towards the center
